topic.title: DMN and BPMN Editors JavaScript Libraries

body.p: From version 9.1.1 the editors used in both BAMOE Canvas and BAMOE Developer Tools are also available as standalone Javascript libraries that can be embedded into any frontend web application.
They are available by importing the following libraries from npm:

ul.li: @ibm/bamoe-standalone-bpmn-and-dmn-editors-classic: The classic DMN and BPMN Editors
@ibm/bamoe-standalone-dmn-editor: The new and modern DMN Editor

section.title: Classic DMN and BPMN Editors
section.p: The following classic GWT-based editors are available as JavaScript file for each Editor.
The modern DMN Editor, built with React, is faster and supports up to DMN 1.5 specifications while maintaining the same simple-to-use API.
